General.Name: Shenzhen Fortune Trend Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Fortune Trend Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of securities analysis and computer communication systems in China. The company offers software for online trading system business innovation and technical performance indicators under the Tongdaxin brand. It also operates a brokerage mobile and composite information platform. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jinen  Tian
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
